title: The Last of Us HBO is OFFICIALLY Returning for Season 2 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.27.23
description:
Go to http://patreon.com/kindafunny to get SO MUCH extra exclusive Kinda Funny content!

Tim and Blessing talk a lot of Last of Us HBO news, Far Cry 7 (and a multiplayer Far Cry Game) leaked, and a rumored Forza delay.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:52 - Housekeeping
A new Shit List and Remember Blank are up on Patreon right now! We talk about the top 10 PS3 games on Shit List and the original Dead Space on Remember Blank.
The Ant Man Rewatch episode of In Review is up right now. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
The Roper Report   -
00:10:19 - The Last of Us HBO is returning for season 2
00:22:57 - Joel from the Last of Us is hosting SNL!
00:27:10 - You Can Watch The First Episode Of The Last Of Us Show For Free Now
00:28:37 - Far Cry 7 and a standalone Far Cry multiplayer game are reportedly in the works
00:41:09 - The Forza Motorsport release date may have been delayed, it’s been claimed
00:50:12 - Skybound Entertainment Makes a Substantial Investment In Mega Cat Studios
00:53:35 - Out today
00:55:36 - Bless’ Hollywood Homie
01:01:46 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
